pullrequest.title: Updated the default contact plugin to reflect the recent changes to the contact sensor

content.raw:
We could add the following as well for people interested in contact forces:

~~~
      std::cout << "   Normal force 1: "
                << contacts.contact(i).normal(j).x() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().x() +
                   contacts.contact(i).normal(j).y() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().y() +
                   contacts.contact(i).normal(j).z() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().z() << "\n";
~~~
content.html:
We could add the following as well for people interested in contact forces:

      std::cout << "   Normal force 1: "
                << contacts.contact(i).normal(j).x() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().x() +
                   contacts.contact(i).normal(j).y() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().y() +
                   contacts.contact(i).normal(j).z() *
                   contacts.contact(i).wrench(j).body_1_force().z() << "\n";
